name: Train Trip 9
description:
Train Trip 9 is a linear game where you will meet intesting people inside a train and hear their thoughts. Relax and enjoy the train ride. The game was made for the (A Game By Its Cover 2020) game jam.

-- -- --

The game was inspired by (Train Trip), a famicase made by Tabata @Tgamemaker. The famicase: http://famicase.com/20/softs/083.html

The music was made by ShadyDave and you can find it here: https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/333811/

The train sound was made by KayleRustone and you can fint it here: https://freesound.org/people/KayleRustone/sounds/474977/

The font was made by datagoblin @vmenezio and you can find it here: https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram
